Html:
When I, as admin, want to edit a story the editting window pops up. But the complete window seems 'greyed out' and I can't edit the story nor any fields.

Can someone tell me what is wrong?

Thanks,

Jos.

I think what you encounter is this known issue with IE. I'm not sure if it is already fixed - I'm still on v2.1. Try editing story with FF.


Regards,
Pawel

Thanks Pawel. But why do the login and the registration pages work? It seems to me that these work in the same way and windows popup, just when I edit a story. Or is this done in a different way?

Regards,
Jos
Maybe it's done in a different way. I haven't got much time to investigate the issue. I just always edit story under FF :)
Same problem... I run IE8. I'm rather tied to browser, but at least their's a workaround.
